link.title: SABIS® International School - Phoenix, Arizona, U.S.A.

h1.strong: Welcome To the SABIS® International School - Phoenix!

article.p: The SABIS® International School - Phoenix is a highly regarded institution that provides a high-quality education to a diverse population in the Phoenix area. SIS-Phoenix strives to help all students to achieve their full potential, prepare them for success in college, equip them with the ability and desire for lifelong learning, and strengthen their civic, ethical, and moral values. The school maintains high standards of efficiency and accountability throughout its operation.

p.a: AVERAGE TEACHER SALARY (A.R.S. §15-189.05), as added by Laws 2018, Ch. 285, §3

article.p: 1.Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2020 $47,020
2. Average salary of all teachers employed in prior year 2019 $44,109
3. Increase in average teacher salary from prior year 2019 $2,911

div.p: SABIS® is a global education network that has an active presence in 20 countries on five continents.
SAGA is the alumni association serving thousands of SABIS® alumni around the world.
The SABIS® Careers website features job openings from across the global SABIS® Network.

div.h5: SABIS® International School - Phoenix, Arizona, U.S.A.

div.div: Please contact your system administrator to recover your SABIS® Password.

div.p: SABIS® International School of Phoenix will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year, per guidelines issued by Governor Doug Ducey. All extracurricular events and scheduled meetings are also cancelled. Parents/Guardians, updates regarding school work and our meal service program will be posted on our school website and sent to you via SABIS Digital Platform. Stay safe and healthy SABIS® Gladiators!

For further information please contact us on:
sis.sabis.net
